system.name: Utility Drop
system.effect:
Trigger - You Shift
Effect: You may use a Smoke Ball, Caltrops, or Toxic Caltrops as a Free action during your Shift. Instead of the Moveâ€™s usual area of effect, you leave one square of Smokescreen, Spikes, or Toxic Spikes on each square you leave as you Shift. Once you place 8 meters of Smoke, Spikes, or Toxic Spikes you may not place any more.
